name: SSF3
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 3
subtitle: Vascular Invasion
notes:
**Note 1**:  Large vessel (venous) invasion may have a worse prognosis than small vessel (capillary/lymphatic) invasion.

**Note 2**:  Record large vessel (venous) invasion as documented in the pathology report. Assign code 000 if surgical resection of the primary site is performed, the pathology report is available for review, and invasion of adrenal vein, renal vein, inferior vena cava (IVC), or large vessel, NOS is not mentioned.
rows: Invasion of inferior vena cava (IVC) only

020 + 010

Invasion of renal vein and adrenal vein

030 + 010

Invasion of IVC and adrenal vein

030 + 020

Invasion of IVC and renal vein

030 + 020 + 010

Invasion of IVC, renal vein, and adrenal vein

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 988

Not applicable for this site

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is  required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
Large vessel venous invasion, vein not specified
No surgical resection of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
